import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Form, Icon, Input, Button, Checkbox } from 'antd'; import 'antd/dist/antd.css'; import WrappedNormalLoginForm from './login'; const BASE_URL = "https://localhost:44352/api/Account"; export default function LoginApi() { axios.post(`${BASE_URL}/Login`, value) .then(response => { if (response.status === "200") window.location.href = "/fuel-wise"; }) .catch(err => console.log(err.response)); return (
TransportWise
Login
); } /*
